Name: Statue of Akhenaten's Daughter
Description: A statue depicting the young daughter of Akhenaten, with unnaturally lengthened skull, large eyes and fleshy lips. One hypothesis about the deformity of the skull and the body is that it was congenital, because the other members of the family, including Akhenaten, had similar deformities, but this is not sufficient to explain what seems to be an artistic choice.
